Package com.wolvencraft.yasp.listeners

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockListener
    Listens to any block changes on the server and reports them to the plugin.
    DeathListener
    Listens to any entity deaths on the server and reports them to the plugin
    ItemListener
    Listens to any item changes on the server and reports them to the plugin.
    PlayerListener
    Listens to miscellaneous player events on the server and reports them to the plugin.
    ServerListener
    Listens to generic server events and reports them to the plugin.
    StatsBookListener
    Handles StatsBook events.
    Prone to errors on CraftBukkit updates.
    StatsSignListener
    Handles StatsSign events
